name: Queen Cobra & The No-Eye-Deer
description:
NOW HEAR THIS! This is the full version of this game! Get ready for gay grandpas, click-hungry journalists, culture jammers and lesbian superheroes who are absolutely NOT engaged to be married OR adopting a litter of labradoodles! 

~

Queen Cobra returns in The Mystery of the No-Eye-Deer, a whodunit of intrigue, backstabbing and baseless speculation! When a legendary diamond is stolen from the Museum of Totally Not Stolen Artifacts, Queen Cobra must find the culprit with the help of her paramour Captain Blood, aka Secretary of the Museum's Board of Directors. Finger the right person and be a hero... or get the wrong person and sleep on the couch!

For an introduction to the main characters, play my dating sim Queen Cobra!
